# Copilot Instructions for Maison de Choco Link Tree

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js single-page application that serves as a link tree for social media accounts.

## Project Requirements
- Single page application
- Top bar with "maison de choco" branding
- Centered buttons linking to:
  - Instagram
  - Facebook
  - TikTok
  - Phone number

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Lucide React for icons
- Turbopack for fast development

## Development
- Development server runs on http://localhost:3000
- Use `npm run dev` to start the development server
- Main page is in `app/page.tsx`
- Global styles in `app/globals.css`
